description: The Directorist – WordPress Business Directory Plugin with Classified Ads Listings plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'setup_wizard' function in all versions up to, and including, 7.8.4. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to recreate default pages and enable or disable monetization and change map provider.

product.name: Directorist – WordPress Business Directory Plugin with Classified Ads Listings
Directorist – WordPress Business Directory Plugin with Classified Ads Listings
